tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very happy with painless procedure. Doctor was patient with every step. Explained everything. Required minimal visits

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I can’t speak enough about Dr Abhilash and his team. I have needed dentists all my life and have always had a fear of them. Not with Dr. Abhilash. He instills such a deep confidence because of his simple, straightforward explanations of every issue and treatment. I had been recommended teeth straightening all my life but only after my husband went through a tooth extraction with Dr Abhilash is when I found someone completely trustworthy. I got my braces at his clinic even though it is a bit far for me and I have multiple options at walking distance from my home. Recently when my 5 year old needed some fillings, we went to Dr Abhilash again. It was such a smooth process because even my daughter trusted him and formed a bond with him, all because of his calm, soothing and friendly manner. I keep recommending him to everyone I know and I would highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for any kind of dental/maxillofacial treatment. Even if you have to travel a bit, it is completely worth!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Zirconia Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
Dr. Abhilash was very friendly, and explained my problem very clearly both in technical and in layman's terms.  He genuinely took time to draw a few sketches in order to provide different solutions/options for the problem. This is very helpful from patients point of view in order to make a firm decision, and know what to expect well ahead. In addition the supporting staffs were very friendly and co-operative.

I will certainly follow-up on a regular basis and would definitely recommend  Absolute clinic to my friends and relatives.
reply_text: Thank u Vignesh

tags: None
review: I have had a couple of root canal treatments in the past. Hence, it is from my previous experiences that I can say that Dr. Abhilash Bhaskaran is the best dentist I have ever met. He is quite courteous and gave me a good understanding about the methodology of his treatment. This further helped me to be at ease during the root canal treatment. After the treatment, I also discussed certain not-so-urgent dental concerns with him and I am now looking forward to addressing those concerns with him in the near future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My experience with Dr. Abhilash was nothing short of amazing. I went to him for RCT, and I hadn't had the slightest bit of pain! Not just during the procedure, but afterwards as well. The local anesthesia was administered almost painlessly. 
*** ** **** ** ******* ****** **** a very sweet smile and he has utmost priority for patient comfort and convenience in mind. He gives a proper explanation for everything... starting from the diagnosis and up to how the procedure will be done. 

Anxiety of dental treatments will never be an issue again for me, thanks to Dr. Abhilash.
reply_text: Thank you Fathima. Nothing more rewarding than a word of appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr Abhilash for all 4 side wisdom tooth extraction and 2 RCT's. I am very much satisfied with the doctor and his team. Dr Abhilash listen to our problems very patiently and he is very empathetic and understands the patients nervousness and pains just from a small change in our facial expressions. He is also very flexible when we ask for a appointment schedule change. I would highly recommend him for ur dental issues. Thank u Dr Abhilash for making the entire process ( close to a month) as painless and smooth as possible.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for the feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very patient, calm and confident Doctor. Dr. Abilash made me very comfortable and the procedure was painless. I am feeling good from the next day itself. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Absolutely professional and friendly with extra ordinary skills.very much satisfied with the treatment procedure and explanation of what is going to be done in the process.

tags: None
review: As an expat I had no-one to recommend a dentist, which was unfortunate as I needed some Root Canal work. Checking on the internet I found Dr. Abhilash Bhaskaran whose practice was just around the corner from where I live and who had spent several years practicing in the UK. Do not be put off by the rather nondescript block of flats where he has his clinic as his surgery is fully modernized. And I am very pleased to say that (as far as visits to the dentists ever can be) that this was far from a bad experience. Dr. Abhilash talked me through what was required, always made sure that I was comfortable and worked with great competence. All in all I was impressed with his work and would thoroughly recommend him.
